VIII.iv.2.A.1.b
.
Circumstances Comparable to POW Detainment
Circumstances comparable to prisoner of war (POW) detainment include, but are not limited to
physical hardships or abuse
psychological hardships or abuse
malnutrition, and
unsanitary conditions.
Note
:  In the absence of evidence to the contrary, consider that each individual in a group of detainees/internees encountered the same circumstances experienced by the group as a whole.
Reference
:  For more information on the circumstances of detention or internment, see
38 CFR 3.1(y)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section A - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
